pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sunlogin Remote Control is a software that supports remote control of mobile devices, Windows, Mac, Linux and other systems. It is the best choice for IT technology, game players, designers and other people with remote management needs. By using Sunlogin, you can control other computers or mobile phones anytime, anywhere. You can make things feasible, including remote high-risk operations, remote power on/off, download files, AFK, and so on. Download Sunlogin and explore more exciting features!

use.flag: Use standalone sys-libs/libsystemd package to provide libsystemd.so for working non-systemd systems.
Keep sunloginclient server running after quit the GUI client.
